GJMR Quartet

Bringing classical music to the 21st century

We are a world-renowned quartet with over over 40 years collective experience playing in major concert halls, performing in weddings & intimate private function, and delivering rigourous masterclasses!

Book us today!

Weddings

Weddings

We provide live, elegant music for weddings of all types, from tradioional to modern, religious to non-religious. You can take your pick among an array of classical pieces, or ask for new arrangements of popular tunes. We cater to you to provide a magical experience

Book Us Today

Private Events

Private Events

From extravagent birthday celebrations, to corporate experiences, to intimtate functions, we are here to serenade and compliment the atmosphere to enhance your event

Book Us Today

Public Concerts

Public Concerts

For the next 18 months, we are booked by major chamber music halls around the world, where we will be playing the whole gamut of classical syles, from Baroque to Romantic to Modern music. Don't miss out on seeing us live and in concert!

Check Our Calendar

Masterclasses

Masterclasses

Need some guidance on how to approach a piece?

Want to take your performance to the next level?

Just need a fresh set of ears to navigate a tricky musical passage?

We offer 1+ hour masterclasses to help you overcome all your musical worries

Dana Yickers,
Gramophone

[GJMR Quartet] made my wedding so special to me and my husband, and I highly recommend you hire them. Walking down the aisle as they played will forever be etched into my memory.

James MacLeod

A stricking and haunting rendition of Bartok's 6th quartet. Every instrument played their part to put on a highly memorable concert!

Ally Sunavant,
Classic FM

The GJMR Quartet created a magical world where every note was played to such a high standard, I forgot I was in a concert hall. The stand-out quartet of the new generation.

Bob Lope,
BBC Music
